Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As you stroll through the busy streets, a familiar face suddenly pops into view.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'All good here. Next location!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Pulao's usual serious demeanor melts away as soon as she spots you."}
{2: "What's up, Pulao?", 3: '12'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Just out here patrolling the streets, making sure everything's safe and sound. After all, it's my duty to keep everyone protected.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds like tough work.', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Not at all. Seeing all those smiles out there gives me a boost of energy.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Glancing around with Pulao, you can see how the joy radiating from the bustling crowd is infectious.'}
{3: 'In this day and age, moments like these are a real gem.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "I'll admit, I was a bit worried when I heard you and your league were taking over the whole commercial street.", 3: '20'}
{2: 'Well, it looks like I may have underestimated you a bit.', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Is this the power of the Little League?', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Of course! We kids, uh, I mean the Little League and I, are pretty darn impressive!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Commandant, you've been around here a few times, right? Any suggestions?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Everything is just perfect.', 3: '27'}
{2: "But there's one tiny hiccup.", 3: '30'}
{3: "Pulao's demeanor shifts, visibly tensing up."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'While the festival spreads joy and ease all around...', 3: '35'}
{2: 'The one who really makes it happen is run off their feet.', 3: '36'}
{2: "That's something you need to fix.", 3: '37'}
{3: 'At your words, Pulao blinks rapidly, her tense expression softening. She crosses her arms and pouts.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'You really had me on edge there, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "But hey, it's all about finding that sweet spot between work and play. Trust those in charge of keeping things safe.", 3: '43'}
{2: 'Pulao, take a breather, will you?', 3: '44'}
{2: 'When it comes to improving the festival, nothing beats experiencing it firsthand, right?', 3: '47'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Hmm... you make a good point, Commandant. Then I'll soak it in a bit and have some personal experience for a change.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Commandant, care to join me?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'd be thrilled.", 3: '51'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Qiao Ya noodles!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Char siu bun!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao follows the tantalizing aroma of food, her lively figure skipping ahead with the trinkets jingling around her waist.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Commandant, check this out! Check it out!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The girl's grin is wider than ever before."}
{3: 'Just as you suspected, even though you just called it "experience," it\'s basically just a blast.'}
{3: 'Pulao giggles at your successful scheme, then blushes a bit at her reaction.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I mean, I'm usually all business, you know!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'For some reason, hanging out with you today made everything way more fun than usual. I was almost...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Whoa, hold up! I didn't mean to imply it was your fault, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: "It's cool, Pulao. I get what you're saying.", 3: '72'}
{2: 'Spending the day with you makes me happier than I have in ages.', 3: '73'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Really? That's awesome!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Oh, by the way, there was something I wanted to talk to you about later tonight, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Commandant, could you do me a favor and close your eyes for a second?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{3: 'You open my eyes. Pulao hands over a panda plushie, dressed in cowboy attire.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Do you remember the Weaver Girl Panda doll you gave me last year? Well, the one I'm giving you now is its partner, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "I promised you a surprise blind box, but a blind box can only fit one gift, and I've got a whole bunch of goodies I want to give you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'So, I came up with this brilliant plan!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Among all the gifts I'm giving you today, one is a special Valentine's Day gift, and the rest are regular Valentine's Day gifts.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "And guess what? You have no idea which one's the special one. It's kind of a blind-box idea!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Here's the first one, Commandant. Take good care of it. There's plenty more where that came from!", 4: '1'}
